title: WTT/WTB Upgrades PSA Cobbs (Green, Red, Bat Off)
author: obcjoe

posts.post_title: WTT/WTB Upgrades PSA Cobbs (Green, Red, Bat Off)
posts.post_content:
Looking to upgrade my PSA 1 Cobbs to PSA 1.5 to 3.
Will trade one for one, either one, two or all my PSA 1 Cobbs and an amount you offer for the difference. I'd also be interested in upgrading my Demmitt and O'hara variations from PSA 1 with same type of trade as for the cobbs.  If interested in the Demmitt and O'hara variations.  I can send a scan, but later this week.
See below for pictures.
